name: soundtrack.js
description: Make handling the soundtracks to your HTML5/JS games somewhat easier. ES6/JS2015 with CommonJS bindings.

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && mkdir docs && rimraf build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir typescript && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typescript

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
